DOC.brief_summary: At investigation want find whether difference muscle strength internal external rotation hip muscle soccer player non-soccer player cause typical movement pattern see soccer sport .
DOC.brief_title: Strength Strength-ratio Hip Rotator Muscles Soccer Players
DOC.detailed_description: Nontraumatic hip injury problem often see Soccer Players . A biomechanical formation mechanism probably . Little research focus measurement hip external internal rotation strength soccer player . The purpose study investigate influence soccer sport isometric force force ratio hip rotator muscle system . Two sample Athletes compare : Soccer Players ( N15 ) Non-soccer player ( N15 ) match sex , age level physical activity investigate hip rotator force 3 different angle hip flexion ( 0°/45°/90° ) . The measurement make handheld dynamometer .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Study group : Amateur footballer ( N15 ) age 18 35 At least five year active footballer 's career Football training twice weekly Active participation play No pain limitation area hip low extremity Control group : Athletes ( N15 ) , nonsoccer player asymmetric leg activity In age 18 35 At least twice weekly sport activity least 30 minute No pain limitation area hip low extremity Exclusion criterion : Professions asymmetric leg activity Pain limitation area hip low extremity Surgery hip prehistory
